TEXT.TITLE: NORWEGIAN UNEMPLOYMENT FALLS IN MARCH
TEXT.BODY: Unemployment fell in March to 36,510, or 1.7 pct of the workforce, compared with 39,700 (1.9 pct) in February and 38,839 (2.2 pct) in March 1986, the Labour Directorate said. REUTER
